name: Stickman Hook 2
description:
Welcome to Stickman Hook 2!

Jump, Hook, Swing, Fly! Launch your grapnel, to swing and fly through a variety of environments to reach the finish line.

If you are familiar with the first Stickman Hook, you may remember that feeling when you perfectly grab, swing and fly across the level to reach the finish line.
When we made Stickman Hook 2, we put a special attention reinforce this feeling, and we implemented new gameplay elements to make the game even smoother and fun!

And for those who like to customise their characters, we created many new skins, we also allow you to customise the wire you use to grab aaaand the trail your character leaves when flying!
Which allows you to create completely unique combinations, for your eyes only

Feel free to give us feedbacks on the game, enjoy!
